original_text: So Moses wrote down this law and gave it to the Levitical priests, who carried the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and to all the elders of Israel.
korean_text: 또 모세가 이 율법을 써서 여호와의 언약궤를 메는 레위 자손 제사장들과 이스라엘 모든 장로에게 주고

sentences.original_text: So Moses wrote down this law
and gave it to the Levitical priests
who carried the ark of the covenant of the Lord
and to all the elders of Israel
